body:
Carsten Bauer wrote:
> Apart from color fidelity, another question which might come into play 
> is to apply a tonemapping process on the HDR image before converting it 
> to rgb. The old Radiance had the pquish script, the newer versions have 
> the 'pcomp' program for that purpose. 


I think you mean 'pcond'.  And yes, the tonemapping that pcond offers is 
very useful for generating "more printable" images.  I use it all the 
time.  Stuff like pcond -h is what separates Radiance from the rest!




    Rob Guglielmetti
www.rumblestrip.org
